channel.title: Others on Live for Today
channel.description: Recent content in Others on Live for Today

item.title: CathySummary
item.description: It is almost end of the year again. Time flies and I need to pause here and recall what have I done during year 2019. Year 2019 Starting reading books This is becoming a new hobby to me. I met a new friend who introduced me to join a reading club on WeChat. We were supposed to read a book each month. We just need to read 25 mins a day but we need to write down a summary after reading each day.

item.title: Flying Home
item.description: 10/23/2019 We got a room available for my mom in this senior house so we decided to go back to my hometown together. The trip was smooth even though it was a long international trip from US to Canada to US to China. We had 4 connections. Andy and I didnâ€™t sleep too much during this trip because the schedule was very tight.

item.title: Today
item.description: Today is mid-autumn festival in China. Today is also my wedding anniversary in US. Today is to remember! We usually don’t celebrate our birthdays. We like to celebrate Valentine’s Day instead. Recently, I read a book and it says that treat today is your last day so you won’t waste your time! I am to a degree if it is a positive day.
